concept.title: What is Table of Contents browsing?

note.#text: The Table of Contents is only available for publications having this structure, such as statutes and treatises.

p: In full document view, you can use the Table of Contents to display a document's location within a publication and navigate to other documents in that publication. For example, if you are viewing a specific Statute section, the Table of Contents displays the structure of the entire statute, showing the names of the sections before and after the one you are viewing.
